WRITING.TEXT: Is this the trick where you turn it and the bunny becomes a rabbit??
This is exactly what Jeff deserved!

Omg, I agree for 100% Everyone is talking about the dance song, but "1000 times" just struck me into my soul man. The moment you realise that Clay had the opportunity to 'save' Hannah destroyed me... When she says: "Clay... Helmet.." after the song is just the most devastating thing ever...
